meanings.definition: The practice of following a set of rituals or ceremonies.
meanings.sent1: In some cultures, ritualism plays a significant role in daily life.
meanings.sent2: The tribe's ritualism included chanting and dancing around a fire.
meanings.sent3: During the ceremony, his ritualism accidentally made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her commitment to ritualism was like a well-choreographed dance.
meanings.sent5: The ancient temple was filled with the echoes of ritualism.

meanings.definition: Excessive devotion to rituals or ceremonies.
meanings.sent1: His ritualism bordered on obsession, causing concern among his friends.
meanings.sent2: The queen's ritualism was so intense that it consumed her every thought.
meanings.sent3: Their ritualism was so extreme that they even had a special ritual for waking up.
meanings.sent4: The ritualism of the old wizard was as powerful as his magic.
meanings.sent5: The dark forest whispered tales of ancient ritualism.
